title: BRIEF-Origin House Says Co Has Acquired 5.8 Mln Common Shares Of Amalgamated Trichome Financial
text:
BRIEF-Origin House Says Co Has Acquired 5.8 Mln Common Shares Of Amalgamated Trichome Financial

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 14, 2019 18:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Origin House Says Co Has Acquired 5.8 Mln Common Shares Of Amalgamated Trichome Financial Oct 14 (Reuters) - CannaRoyalty Corp : * ORIGIN HOUSE - BY AMALGAMATION OF TRICHOME FINANCIAL AND 22 CAPITAL CORP, CO HAS ACQUIRED 5.8 MILLION COMMON SHARES OF AMALGAMATED TRICHOME FINANCIAL

BRIEF-Origin House Says Co Has Acquired 5.8 Mln Common Shares Of Amalgamated Trichome Financial
